SEARCH
Package com.example.chicksevent

Class TEST39_US030601_AdminBrowseImagesUITest

java.lang.Object
com.example.chicksevent.TEST39_US030601_AdminBrowseImagesUITest
public class TEST39_US030601_AdminBrowseImagesUITest extends Object
UI tests for US 03.06.01: As an administrator, I want to be able to browse images that are uploaded so I can remove them if necessary. These tests validate that:
  • Image browsing button is visible in admin home screen
  • Image browsing button is clickable
  • Image browsing screen displays uploaded images
  • Images can be removed/deleted
  • Image list is scrollable if there are many images
Note: For reliable Espresso testing, disable animations on the device/emulator: 
 adb shell settings put global window_animation_scale 0
 adb shell settings put global transition_animation_scale 0
 adb shell settings put global animator_duration_scale 0

    • navigateToAdminHome

      private boolean navigateToAdminHome()
      Navigates to the admin home screen. Note: Navigation to AdminHomeFragment is typically from NotificationFragment via the action_NotificationFragment_to_AdminHomeFragment. In a full test setup, this would require admin user authentication.
